Docs the central square appear in front of the patem of circles or is it seen as appearing through a square hole in the pattern of circles? The only difference in the two images is the sharpness of the edge between the line and circle patterns (Marshall, Burbeck. Arely, Rolland, and Martin (1999), used by permission).
